original_text: So come to the Lord Jesus. He is like a big stone that a builder uses to build a house. But he is alive. People decided that he was not important. So they refused him. But God had chosen him. To God, Jesus is very valuable.
korean_text: 사람에게는 버린 바가 되었으나 하나님께는 택하심을 입은 보배로운 산 돌이신 예수께 나아가

sentences.original_text: So come to the Lord Jesus.
He is like a big stone
that a builder uses to build a house.
sentences.korean_translation: 건축가가 집을 짓는 데 사용하는 것처럼입니다.

sentences.original_text: People decided that he was not important.
To God, Jesus is very valuable.
